message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $20000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to come down to $17500. This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it a great value.  Let me know what you think.
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $17500. Would you be willing to meet me at $16000? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
